com.skobbler.ngx.sdktools.navigationui.autonight

Class SKToolsAutoNightManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.sdktools.navigationui.autonight.SKToolsAutoNightManager

  • public class SKToolsAutoNightManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles auto night related operations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean wasSetAlarmForSunriseSunsetCalculation
      true if the alarm for sunrise / sunset calculation was set, false otherwise

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SKToolsAutoNightManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateSunriseSunsetHours(double latitude, double longitude)
      Calculates sunrise and sunset hours
      void cancelAlarmForDayNightModeWithSunriseSunset()
      Cancels the alarm for day / night mode with sunrise / sunset calculation.
      void cancelAlarmForForHourlyNotification()
      Cancels the alarm for hourly notification.
      static SKToolsAutoNightManager getInstance() 
      boolean isCurrentTimeInSunriseSunsetLimit()
      Checks if the current time of user's device is in sunrise sunset limit.
      void setAlarmForDayNightModeWithSunriseSunset(Context context)
      Sets the alarm for sunrise / sunset and starts to listen for the times of changing the map style (day/night).
      void setAlarmForHourlyNotification(Context context)
      Sets the alarm and starts to listen for the times when an hour has passed, in the case when autonight is on.
      void setAlarmForHourlyNotificationAfterKitKat(Context context, boolean startNow)
      Sets the alarm and starts to listen for the times when an hour has passed, in the case when autonight is on.
      void setAutoNightAlarmAccordingToUserPosition(double latitude, double longitude, Activity currentActivity)
      Sets auto day / night alarm according to user position if the user position is null is set the alarm with fixed hours (8AM, 8PM), otherwise is set the alarm for calculation of sunrise / sunset hours.
